name: Ibuprofen
caution: Take with food. Avoid if you have ulcers.

name: Atorvastatin
caution: Avoid large amounts of grapefruit juice.

name: Aspirin
caution: Do not mix with other blood thinners.

name: Azithromycin
caution: Take on empty stomach if instructed.

name: Levothyroxine
caution: Take on empty stomach 30 mins before food.

name: Pantoprazole
caution: Long term use may affect magnesium levels.

name: Ciprofloxacin
caution: Drink water; avoid dairy/calcium near dose.
